title: Up vote if you think Karthus needs more nerfs!

replies.poster: x R e n g a R x
replies.body:
Oh hey let's nerf everyone that has a win rate of 52 or above...

So many babies on these boards. No wonder Riot never takes any of you seriously.

Constant {{item:3070}} about ANYTHING they don't like.

HAHAHHAHAHAH
There wouldn't be any bitching if Riot's balance team weren't a complete joke.

replies.poster: x R e n g a R x
replies.body:
You do realize we're lucky to have a very very small % of the actual player base on these boards...

Because you know what would happen if everyone that played this game were on the boards?

CONSTANT ... 'PLEASE NERF ________ CHAMP!!!' spamming all over this place.

And there also will be the other part of players who actually love the game and UNDERSTAND that it takes an extensive amount of time to make changes and reworks. You know nothing about what it takes to make a game like this.

People like you think it's a walk in the park to just go in there and change champion stats and boo hoo it's all fixed.
I can make this game fun and balanced again in less then a week if Riot let me.

replies.poster: x R e n g a R x
replies.body: HAHAHAHHAHAHAHAHHAHA I'm outta here thanks for the laugh yo {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Thought you were quiting. Would be nice if someone finally meant it when they said that
Never said I was quitting the boards.

> [{quoted}](name=Pentarina Only,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=dqw0UmRt,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-05-26T23:23:07.000+0000)
>
> Never said I was quitting the boards.

What a joke you are.
70% aoe slow for 5 seconds is huge!
Karthus nerfs? His q is hard to land as it already is.
